Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix layout overflow errors in contact section

- Changed container to use minHeight constraint instead of fixed height
- Made Column flexible with mainAxisSize.min to prevent overflow
- Wrapped form Stack in Flexible widget for adaptive sizing
- Reduced excessive bottom spacing from 10vh to 12-16px
- Changed form height to maxHeight constraint for flexibility

This resolves the RenderFlex overflow errors (2.6px and larger) that were appearing in the contact section.
